p:
The apparent molecular masses of the synthesized polymer were determined by Gel Permeation Chromatograph (GPC) using two PL Gel 30 cm × 5 μm mixed columns at 30 °C running in DMF and calibrated against poly(methyl methacrylate) (PMMA) standards ( M
n = 2000-10 6 g mol −1) standards using a Knauer refractive index detector.
